title: EstateExec Estate Executor Online Software
description: EstateExec Makes Executor Duties Easy! An Estate Executor (also known as a Personal Representative, Administrator, or Trustee) is someone legally responsible for settling a deceased person's estate. Whether it's your first time serving as an executor, or you are a professional estate attorney, EstateExec will make the process easier and simpler.  EstateExec is online software that provides an executor with automated guidance, customized for the estate details, and automated financial tracking and calculations. Its comprehensive guide describes the overall process, covering everything from estate EINs to probate signature instructions, and the software automatically generates list of tasks customized for your estate, including due dates. EstateExec also integrates accounting of assets, debts, expenses, and distributions, and calculates executor compensation, cost basis, and more. It can generate PDF financial reports, such as Inventory and Accounting reports. You can optionally share access with co-executors, probate lawyers, or heirs, assigning, assigning edit or view permissions. Runs in a web browser on any platform: PC, Mac, iPhone, Android, etc. Handles every US state and territory, and every Canadian province and territory.
